body.name: Vixic Embossing Label Maker, Omega S Embosser Labeler, Portable Embossed Label Maker, Handheld Embosser Label Printer with 3 Rolls 3D Embossing Label for Home DIY, Green

features: Easy-to-Use Embossing Label Maker: The Vixic embossing label maker is a standalone device that doesn't require a phone or computer connection. It operates manually without the need for batteries or ink, saving money and efficient. Simply press the handle to quickly print characters for immediate application.

User-Friendly Operation: The embossing labeling machine features a dial with letters, numbers, characters, and cutters. Users can easily turn the dial and press the handle to print the label. This simple operation makes it suitable for users of all ages,such as children or elder people. Use this embossing labeler to label and organize your home, office, shop, including kitchen items, spice bottles, files, personal belongings, photo albums, and DIY like holiday gifts for friends and family.

Handheld and Portable Design: The embossing label maker machine with tape is handheld and portable. The cover of the device features a transparent frosted design, allowing for easy ribbon usage. The handle is designed to fit comfortably in the palm of the hand and has a raised anti-slip design, enabling better pressing and printing.

Compatible with 9mm Width Embossed Labels: This embossing label maker machine with tape is compatible with 9mm width embossed labels. These labels have 3D effects and are easier to read. They are water-resistant, abrasion-resistant, temperature-resistant, grease-resistant, and fade-resistant. The labels offer strong adhesive, are easy to peel, stick to most clean surfaces, and won't break or leave residue when removed. This makes them durable for both indoor and outdoor applications.
Package Includes: The embossing label maker machine comes with one embosser labeler and 3 rolls embossing labels(Black on White) for continuous use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Embossing Label Maker - Without batteries, ink/toner cartridges or phone connection, you can experience the joy of printing with the most original, retro press, clear and concise character dial to meet the daily needs of printing content.The dial of the embossing label maker has 48 characters, such as ：letters, numbers, characters and cutters. Turn the dial to select and press the handle to print out the label.Simple operation suitable for all ages.

Step 1 : Move the dial to the space "-"Step 2: Install the embossing label to the proper positionStep 3: Press the handle several times to fully access the printerStep 4: Make sure the character is in the middle and press the grip to print

Using Tips of Embossing Label Maker : Please align the "|| ||" symbol on the side before each use and entering spaces at the beginning, at the end, and between characters, pressing and holding for a few seconds and then releasing will make the label more clearly

Compatible with 9mm width Embossed Label: The plastic material has a 3D effect, is easy to read and is resistant to water, abrasion, temperature, grease and fading. It has good adhesion, peels easily, adheres to most clean surfaces, removes without breaking or leaving a residue and is a durable tape for indoor and outdoor use.Use this embossing labeler to label and organize your home, office, shop and others,including kitchen, spice bottles,file,presonal things, photo album and DIY thing like Holiday gift to your fiends or family, ect. it's easy to keep your life organized and have fun.
Our Vixic Omega S Embossing Label Maker Keep Everything Organized in Daily Life

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to be able to make embossed labels similar to the vintage style that was around in the 70s and these did not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Dummy proof and very cute labels

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke after using twice
reviews.reviewText: Used it twice and then it wouldn’t work anymore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It made 4 labels then the tape jammed. I unjammed it and it jammed again so I returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nostalgic labeling in a flash
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what you’d expect from a classic, old-school, analog style label maker. Easy to start using, and comes with a front / back page of instructions and troubleshooting. I love the vintage look and how quickly and easily I can create labels. I’ve included photos of how I used it so far - to label compartments in this container. I deducted a star for a minor issue (still totally worth buying!!) - there is a balance for how hard to squeeze. The first one I made (see photo for “AAA batteries”) came out kind of weak, as I didn’t squeeze hard enough. Then I guess I overcompensated, and when you squeeze TOO hard, the spacing between letters comes out wonky; I’m guessing it crimps the tape so severely that it loses some space between letters. So go into it knowing you might be performing some “do-overs” if you’re picky about how it looks! It comes with plenty of tape, so you will be able to label your heart out. Also - something nice about it is that when you cut it in the machine to end the label, it makes a nice spot to peel the backing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and works great for quick and easy labeling
reviews.reviewText: Such a cute little label maker. If you are wanting a basic little label maker and you don’t care about how pretty the text looks then this is totally the way to go. It came with a lot of rolls and works super easily. The labels are nice and small so they fit on many different surfaces and they stick pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for labeling and organizing
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed organizing and labeling all my different items. Now every thing is nice and neat. Works great and it's really simple to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice Product but Poor Quality Output
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this product, as I could always use a good embossing label maker. However, the Vixic Embossing Label Maker Machine left a great deal to be desired as it relates to print quality.The item was well packaged and included three rolls of embossing tape. The instructions accompanying the product were well written and clear. I had no problem loading the tape, selecting letters and cutting the label. I was pleased that the manufacturer included extra embossing tape and clear instructions. The product is super-easy to use right out of the box. However, that’s where all of the positive points remain. Regrettably, the major area of importance for this product is the ability to deliver clear, crisp, labels. In that area, this product does not excel. I printed a number of labels and found that many letters were scrunched together such that it was difficult to make out the letter or the embossing was so uneven that some parts of a letter were not well done. Letters like G, B, M, S and others simply did not look crisp. I have included a picture of a sample label for you to decide for yourself.Years ago, I had a similar embossing label maker from a major brand and it was outstanding. This is a product I will not continue to use and I will be searching for another.I should explain the 2 star rating. While the quality of the label was truly poor in my opinion, the manufacturer did some things well as noted above and I wanted to at least acknowledge that effort.
